column4: Tesla investor group wants more independent board  cites Musk ties
column5: SAN FRANCISCO An investor group called on Tesla Motors Corp  on Tuesday to add two independent directors to its board and separate the roles of chairman and chief executive as it highlighted founder and CEO Elon Musk's dominance of the board in the wake of Tesla's proposed bid for SolarCity.

column4: UPDATE 1-Tesla investor group wants more independent board  cites Musk ties
column5: SAN FRANCISCO  June 28 An investor group called on Tesla Motors Corp on Tuesday to add two independent directors to its board and separate the roles of chairman and chief executive as it highlighted founder and CEO Elon Musk's dominance of the board in the wake of Tesla's proposed bid for SolarCity.

column4: BRIEF-Intel is working with Mobileye to develop self-driving car technology for BMW AG- Bloomberg
